hero.title: AI Trading & Analytics Platform
hero.description: Automated trading platform with ML forecasting across multiple cryptocurrency exchanges, achieving 45% ROI improvement.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Build automated trading platform with ML forecasting across multiple cryptocurrency exchanges with high-frequency demands. The system needed to process market data in real-time, make split-second trading decisions, and manage risk across volatile markets.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.content: Serverless AWS architecture with TensorFlow/PyTorch models, real-time data processing, and exchange API integrations. The platform continuously trained and deployed ML models for price prediction while executing automated trading strategies with sophisticated risk management.

results.title: Results & Impact
results.content: The platform achieved 45% ROI improvement through intelligent trading strategies and ML-powered market analysis. Fully automated 24/7 trading eliminated emotional decision-making while the serverless architecture kept operational costs minimal. Multi-exchange support enabled arbitrage opportunities and portfolio diversification.
